name: SustainCraft
description:
Tomorrowcraft Game Jam Entry - https://itch.io/jam/tomorrowcraft

Name: SustainCraft

Team:

Jörg Burbach (Programming)
Djamel Berkaoui (Graphics)

Software & Assets:

- Unity (Game Development) + Fungus (Programming Asset)
- KenShape (3D Art creation)
- Krita (2D Graphics creation)
- Additional licenced graphics & music assets

Topic:

Ressource collection and investment into new technology, sharing data about pro & cons of investments

Genre:

Clicker / Idle Game

Detail:

By collecting specific resources, you can change the outcome of these 3. Try to find the best solution in maintaining high contentment of people, while not stressing out the planet's environment too much and gaining prosperity points to invest in new technologies.

Current version includes:

- Overview screen
- Resource collection
- show first technology level with coal, water power, wind power

Future features:

- Investment into new technologies
- Game win and Game over settings
- Environment effects
- Consistent art style
- 5 different technology levels with several power plants
